description.lang: The IQ Panel 2 is a 7 HD Touchscreen with built-in 5MP panel camera used for residential and small business security, life safety, and smarthome applications. Behind the ultra-thin bezel with intuitive swipe based user interface lie multiple wireless radios including LTE and WiFi dual-path connectivity, Bluetooth for touchless disarming, S-Line encrypted 319.5 for secure security and life safety communication and Z-Wave Plus for the fastest, most reliable smarthome automation experience possible. At only 7.5 wide by 5 tall and 1 deep the IQ Panel looks amazing on the wall and also includes a table stand for mounting on counters, tables or other surfaces. The IQ Panel leverages the powerful Alarm.com interactive service platform including the AirFX remote tool kit which provides full access to every setting and system function from the cloud, allowing you to retire the truck, reduce service requests, and improve the overall customer experience. Learn more at Qolsys.com.
